results.title: A Preliminary Investigation on the Effects of Atenolol for Treating Symptoms of Anxiety.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: The results showed 86% of @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ reporting a positive effect and continuing to take @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@, including 87% with a diagnosis of @<m>DISEASE_Stress_Disorders_Post_Traumatic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D013313 @@@posttraumatic stress disorder@@@, 100% with diagnosis of other specified @DISEASE_Trauma_and_Stressor_Related_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D000068099 @@@trauma- and stressor-related disorder@@@, and 81% diagnosed with @DISEASE_Anxiety_Disorders @DISEASE_MESH:D001008 @@@anxiety disorders@@@.

citations.NLM: Armstrong C, Kapolowicz MR. A Preliminary Investigation on the Effects of Atenolol for Treating Symptoms of Anxiety. Mil Med. 2020 Dec 30;185(11-12):e1954-e1960. PMID: 32728694
